item.title: Buy Our 'Destroy AI' Hoodie
item.content:encoded:
Published: December 01, 2025, 4:31 pm

It's almost winter, and you know what that means: hoodie season. It also means you now have the opportunity to not only buy a very nice new hoodie, but one that supports human artists (and websites).

Specifically, this one: our 'Destroy AI' design--with art by the incredible Kim Hu--is now available as a hoodie. And it's an excellent hoodie, because like our existing logo design, it ships on an AS Color blank, with a relaxed/oversized fit and premium construction.

Like all our artist collabs, all proceeds from sales of this hoodie are split between a website run by humans and a human artist. You can buy it here:

'Destroy AI' Hoodie

Butlerian Jihad now

BUY HERE



https://aftermath.site/destroy-ai-aftermath-kim-hu-hoodie-shirt/
